title: Looking for midlaner for gold 1 ranked team
body: Looking for a mid laner to play in our gold 1 ranked team. Would prefer a platnum to join becouse all people are diamond and plat. Add eQ Axcus for info

replies.body:
Im interested :)

IGN: CookiezzNZ
Rank: Plat 1
Age: 18
Champ Pool: Malzahar, Swain, Fizz, Katarina, Ahri, Brand, Twisted Fate. (Open to learning champs)
Communication: All

I'd be interested - Plat V Mid main!

IGN: Plottel
Age: 19
Rank: Plat V
Champ Pool: Fizz/Syndra/Ahri/Orianna/Katarina/Diana (Will learn any new champ as required by team)
Communication: All

I will be on around 6pm AEST tonight and will add you then

I play mid but don't play many of the long range meta champs as I main top lane. I'm Diamond V. I can play:

* Lissandra
* Swain
* Irelia
* Karthus
* Vlad
* Malphite
* Fiddlesticks
